title: Can't log in.
body:
Tried reconnecting. Turning off my laptop and wifi nothing seems to work. Looked at the server status and nothing seems to be wrong right now. 
The message I get reads. 
Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching. 
We're giving it another shot. In the meantime, you can check the status of our servers here. (error code 003 )

replies.body:
Hey there,

Having the same issue on my side as well as about 5 other people in my Discord Server.

I put a ticket through to Rito but who knows when they'll get onto it.
